resource.title: Studio Miniboss Pixelart Tutorials
resource.body: !format (( Wonderfully put together by [https://twitter.com/saint11][Pedro Medeiros] of [http://blog.studiominiboss.com/][Studio Miniboss], the makers of Towerfall and Celeste, this collection of animated mini-tutorials is contains a huge wealth of insight into pixelart fundamentals, animation, effects, and more! With topics such as walk cycle animation, UI design, drawing/animating fabrics, motion blur effects, and creating goopy fluids, there's sure to be something for pixelartists of all levels of experience! )) (( [http://blog.studiominiboss.com/pixelart][Take a look at the whole collection], and be sure to bookmark the page to check for new additions! You can also get everything packaged in a nice little bundle through Pedro's [https://www.patreon.com/saint11][Patreon] or [https://studiominiboss.itch.io/pixel-art-tutorials][Itch.io]! ))
